cmabreu.sagitarii.teapot.console

Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmabreu.sagitarii.teapot.console.CommandLine

  • public class CommandLine
extends Object
    This class provides a generic command-line interpreter. See CommandLineTest.java for a usage example.
    Author:
    medined Created on May 20, 2003

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CommandLine.ICommand
      A simple interface to enforce how the command classes are executed.

      A simple constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLine

        public CommandLine()
        A simple constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • assignClassToCommnd

        public void assignClassToCommnd(String cmd,
                       String clazz)
        Makes the correspondence between the command and the class to invoke. Notice that the command is trimmed and converted to upper-case.
        Parameters:
        cmd - The command token to assign to clazz.
        clazz - The java class that implements the command.

      • cmdHelp

        public void cmdHelp()
        Invoked by the HELP command. It displays a list of active commands. Note that the list may change if the assignClassToCommand method is called after the HELP command is executed.

      • getCommandLineHeader

        public String getCommandLineHeader()
        Getter for commandLineHeader variable.
        Returns:
        the command line header.

      • getCommandLineHelp

        public String getCommandLineHelp()
        Getter for commandLineHelp variable.
        Returns:
        the command line help.

      • getCommandLinePrompt

        public String getCommandLinePrompt()
        Getter for commandLinePrompt variable.
        Returns:
        the command line prompt.

      • getCommandLineVersion

        public String getCommandLineVersion()
        Getter for commandLineVersion variable.
        Returns:
        the command line version.

      • init

        public void init()
        Displays the version, basic command list, and optional help message.

      • parseStream

        public void parseStream(StreamTokenizer st)
        Parses the input stream into tokens. Note that quotes are needed when command-line parameters have spaces.
        Parameters:
        st - The tokenizer object to use.

      • runMethod

        public boolean runMethod(String theName,
                List v)
        This method hides the ugly details of reflection. In a nutshell it invokes the doIt() method of the java class associated with the command being executed.
        Parameters:
        theName - The name of the class to execute.
        v - The command line parses into tokens.
        Returns:
        The return value of the doIt() method.

      • setCommandLineHeader

        public void setCommandLineHeader(String string)
        Setter for the commandLineHeader variable
        Parameters:
        string - The command line header.

      • setCommandLineHelp

        public void setCommandLineHelp(String string)
        Setter for the commandLineHelp variable
        Parameters:
        string - The command line help.

      • setCommandLinePrompt

        public void setCommandLinePrompt(String string)
        Setter for the commandLinePrompt variable
        Parameters:
        string - The prompt.

      • setCommandLineVersion

        public void setCommandLineVersion(String string)
        Setter for the commandLineVersion variable
        Parameters:
        string - The version.

      • setIsInteractive

        public void setIsInteractive(boolean isInteractive)
        Sets the isInteractive status.
        Parameters:
        isInteractive - The isInteractive to set
